trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL000_00149_SEQ_00<tab>Wymond would like to know what you think of Ul'dah.

TEXT_SUBWIL000_00149_SEQ_01<tab>Ever the consummate professional, Wymond has taken the opportunity to task you with a delivery. Do as bade and take his message to Josias at the Pugilists' Guild inside the Platinum Mirage.

TEXT_SUBWIL000_00149_SEQ_02<tab>The Pugilists' Guild offers protective services, but only to those who can afford it. The unsigned envelope contained the assessment of a petitioner whose finances were found lacking. Alas, the Platinum Mirage is not a charity.
TEXT_SUBWIL000_00149_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the unsigned envelope to Josias.

TEXT_SUBWIL000_00149_WYMOND_000_1<tab>So, how're you takin' to Ul'dah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? <var 08 E4E94702 ((Eh? How do I know your name? Heh! Information is my stock and trade, 'venturer. You'd be amazed by what I know.)) ((<var 08 E4E94703 ((Eh? How do I know your name? Heh! Information is my stock and trade, 'venturer. You'd be amazed by what I know.)) ((<var 08 E4E94704 ((Make any new friends in high places yet? Hah! Well, when you have the sultana's ear one day, I hope you won't have forgotten about ol' Wymond!)) ((Eh? How do I know your name? Heh! Information is my stock and trade, 'venturer. You'd be amazed by what I know.)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>
TEXT_SUBWIL000_00149_WYMOND_000_2<tab>Long as you're here, mayhap you can do me a favor an' take this missive to Josias at the Platinum Mirage.
TEXT_SUBWIL000_00149_WYMOND_000_3<tab>It's just over yonder, an' the man'll even give you some gil for your trouble. If only all work in the city was this easy, eh?

TEXT_SUBWIL000_00149_GAGARUNA_000_5<tab>Do you have business with the Platinum Mirage <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((this evening)) ((this morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((today)) ((this evening)) /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_SUBWIL000_00149_GAGARUNA_000_6<tab>A missive from Wymond? Alright then, let's have a look...
TEXT_SUBWIL000_00149_GAGARUNA_000_7<tab>"Bird is barren. Let the hounds feast.“ <sigh> So it goes.

TEXT_SUBWIL000_00149_GAGARUNA_000_8<tab>Oh, this? Well you see, the guild is often contracted to provide protective services. Unfortunately for this particular petitioner, Wymond's investigation has revealed his finances to be...wanting.

TEXT_SUBWIL000_00149_GAGARUNA_000_9<tab>Maybe adventurers like you don't mind working for free, but we have a business to run. I myself have four mouths to feed, so this <var 1A 02 /var>bird<var 1A 01 /var> will have to fend for himself, I'm afraid.
